name: Totoro's Science Frenzy
description: The perfect app to learn elementary level science, Totoro's Science Frenzy mobile app will help children learn both biology and astronomy in a fun and exciting way! The app features two different quizzes, one for biology questions, and one for astronomy questions, and at the end of the quiz, the app provides a link to a science website where children can further their understanding of science. Not only that, there is also the option to email the score so that friends, family, and teachers can see!
